profile.title: Profile
profile.description: I build modern, fast, and responsive web applications with a focus on user experience and functionality. My goal is to create digital products that are both visually appealing and highly effective.

welle.title: "3. Welle" - Berlin Coffee Shop Finder
welle.description: Fullstack application designed to help Berlin residents and visitors discover the best specialty coffee shops in the city. Users can explore a map of coffee shops, read and leave reviews, and find essential information about each location.

bvg.title: "BVG App" - Berlin Public Transport App
bvg.description: This application designed for viewing real-time arrival times of public transport at stops in Berlin and Brandenburg

eisenhower.title: "Eisenhower Matrix App" - Task Management Tool
eisenhower.description: Web app for organizing tasks based on the Eisenhower Matrix principle.

encryptnotes.title: "Encrypt notes" - Short message encryption service
encryptnotes.description: This is a fullstack application designed for encrypting short notes.

contact.title: Let's stay in touch
contact.description: I'm based in Berlin but open to remote work opportunities. If you're working on something exciting or want to explore potential collaboration, don't hesitate to get in touch. I'm actively responding to emails and would love to connect!
